DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect Dialogues Time Talk program subject treat Venlafaxine Extended Release ( ER ) . Dialogues Time Talk Program patient management program , aim help patient achieve successful outcome reinforce physician treatment effort , provide feedback treat physician , encourage well physician-patient communication .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label , Randomized Study Evaluating Treatment With Venlafaxine Extended-Release Plus Dialogues Time Talk Program
DOC.criteria: Currently experience major depressive episode , require initiation antidepressant drug treatment change current antidepressant drug treatment At least 18 year age History presence bipolar disorder Current treatment venlafaxine
